text: this was where families had come to
enjoy a Sunday in the park and to
celebrate Easter and this is where the
devastation hit a suicide bomb detonated
in the middle of a crowded Park security
forces and rescue workers were quickly
on the scene as crowds gathered amid
confusion in chaos as the dead and
injured were carried to hospitals across
the city one man described how he tried
to help
I carried 20 children to the ambulance
to be taken to hospital I moved three
bodies to a police car at the time of
the blast the children were playing at
the ground as the casualties arrived at
the city's main hospitals so too did
relatives desperate for news nesrin was
among them she had lost her two
daughters in the blast my two girls were
in the park she says they were both
killed
we found one body the other is still
missing
it's scenes of absolute chaos here and
one of the major hospitals in Lahore as
distressed family members have been
rushing in trying to find out what
happened to their relatives the hospital
workers have been trying to tell people
to clear the way so that ambulances can
come in and bring in more casualties
we're surrounded by security forces who
are trying very hard to keep the area
under control as the authorities house
the outside tried to put together the
pieces and find out what exactly and who
exactly was behind this attack
shortly after Jamaat a fraud a group
that split away from the Pakistani
Taliban said they had carried out the
attack
the Christian community was the target
but it wasn't just Christians who were
hit dozens were killed and the number of
dead is likely to rise this attack
another violent reminder of the
challenge facing security forces here of
how vulnerable these soft targets are
